attributes.review: So here’s the problem with this app. One day I was on instagram and I saw an add for this app and I thought it would be a great way to stay updated on daddy Trump. I decided to download the app. Immediately after the downloading was completed, I got a call on my phone. It was a No Caller ID number. I decided to decline, but shortly after, i received another call. Decline. Another call. Decline. Finally after an hour of receiving these calls i answered. “Hello? Who’s this?” I questioned the mysterious caller. “Look outside your window” said the caller. My stomach dropped and i hung up. I got up to look out my window and there he was. The cheeto puff himself. Daddy Trump. I felt a variety of emotions. Terrified, happy, confused, intensely horny. I raced down my steps only to find that Daddy Trump had vanished from his original position on my doorstep. Discouraged, i turned away to head back up my stairs, but as i turned, a bright orange figure flashed in front of me. It was Daddy Trump. “Donald!” i said. “It’s me. I left my tanning session early to come see you.” As he said this i noticed that his bright orange pigment stopped about halfway down his arm. “Why did you come?” i asked. “I had to tell you before it’s too late” Daddy Trump said. “Tell me what Donald?” But it was too late. Trump had already vanished in a puff of orange smoke. All that was left was some cheeto dust. I grabbed my broom and began to sweep up the cheeto dust. Sad and alone, missing Daddy Trump, i decided to go to sleep early that night. As i sat in my bed watching TikToks, i decided to delete this app off my phone. This app has only brought me sexual confusion and sadness. Delete this app at once.
attributes.title: THIS APP GAVE ME TRAUMA AND SEVERAL MENTAL AND PHYSICAL DISORDERS
